message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.GT, cs.CV, cs.CL. 

The paper presents a machine learning approach for plan recognition in real-time strategy games, which falls under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The Bayesian model used for prediction involves learning parameters from game logs, which is a common technique in machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the strategic planning aspect of the game, which could fall under game theory (cs.GT). The model is applied to StarCraft, which is a game that involves visual and spatial reasoning, suggesting computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL) could also be relevant sub-categories.
